channel.title: Error on run
channel.description: I just set up my VPS, and it worked all day today, and then all of sudden I get this error [code]java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at net.com.hydroPK.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:47) at net.com.hydroPK.Server.main(Server.java:56) Press any key to continue . . .[/code] it runs fine on my computer, but not on the VPS for some reason, can anyone help?

item.title: Error on run
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Don’t be so sure
Check the process list for anything that may be using the port(Even an old java.exe that was used to run your sever)

Read full topic

item.title: Error on run
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

The specified port is already in use.

Read full topic

item.title: Error on run
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

I just set up my VPS, and it worked all day today, and then all of sudden I get this error

java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at net.com.hydroPK.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:47) at net.com.hydroPK.Server.main(Server.java:56) Press any key to continue . . .
it runs fine on my computer, but not on the VPS for some reason, can anyone help?

Read full topic
